name: array_query_parameters
description: Validates that array query parameters follow Solace REST API conventions as per ADR

conditions.message: Array query parameters MUST be formatted as comma-separated values (e.g. ?ids=id1,id2,id3)
Array query parameters MUST NOT use the format ?ids[]=id1&ids[]=id2
Array query parameters MUST NOT use the format ?ids=id1&ids=id2
Array query parameters MUST NOT use the format ?ids=id1+id2+id3
